snippet: Live video of a news conference scheduled for 11 a.m. E.T. in Oak Creek, Wisconsin, where law enforcement officials are expected to provide more details about the shooting rampage at a Sikh temple.
abstract: Live video of a news conference scheduled for 11 a.m. E.T. in Oak Creek, Wisconsin, where law enforcement officials are expected to provide more details about the shooting rampage at a Sikh temple.

headline.main: Video of News Conference About Shooting at Sikh Temple in Wisconsin
